mapper.select: select rownum as rno, mail_no, title, content, send_id, recv_id, to_char(reg_date,'mm-dd hh24:mi') reg_date, is_checked from ( select * from mail where recv_id=#{recv_id} order by reg_date desc)
select count(recv_id) from mail where recv_id = #{id} and is_checked=0
mapper.update: update mail set is_checked = 1 where mail_no = #{mail_no}
